price: ከጌታችሁ ወደ ኾነችም ምሕረትና ስፋትዋ እንደ ሰማያትና ምድር ወደ ኾነች ገነት አላህን ለሚፈሩ የተዘጋጀች ስትኾን ተቻኮሉ፡፡
arabic: ۞ وَسَارِعُوٓاْ إِلَىٰ مَغۡفِرَةٖ مِّن رَّبِّكُمۡ وَجَنَّةٍ عَرۡضُهَا ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتُ وَٱلۡأَرۡضُ أُعِدَّتۡ لِلۡمُتَّقِينَ

version.title: Amharic translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Amharic by Muhammad Sadeq and Muhammad Ath-Thany Habib. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wasāriʿū ilā maghfiratin min rabbikum wajannatin ʿarḍuhā al-samāwātu wal-arḍu uʿiddat lil'muttaqīna
